text: Rudy Anthony Dawson Forbes (born May 8, 1988) is a Costa Rican professional soccer player who plays for AD San Carlos. == Career == ===Club=== ====Puerto Rico FC==== In May 2016, Dawson signed with NASL side Puerto Rico FC.
